message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $130. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. How about we meet halfway at $115?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  $105 is my final offer - I know you'll find value in it at that price.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me there?
